reviewText:
If your just starting out as a new Football player, no matter what the position, this video is for you, sadly its available ONLY on VHS, something they should really consider putting to DVD, aside from that, start to finish, they cover all basics, every position, including an added bonus at the end about weight training.

If your an upcoming QB or Center, this is a MUST video for you more than anything else, they actually take more time through the whole video and in detail cover all rounds of those positions, esp the exchange between the QB/CENTER at the start of the play.
